definition: Swarm Electric Flied Instrument (EFI) Thermal Ion Imager (TII) 16Hz Cross-Track ion flow velocity dataset
description: Swarm Electric Flied Instrument (EFI) Thermal Ion Imager (TII) dataset at 16 Hz cadence containing cross-track ion measurements: the TII L1B data processing is simplified by deriving ion flow velocity components perpendicular to the satellite velocity vector. The data also include the electric field, magnetic field in the same coordinate frame.
variables_table:
Variable,Units,Description,Dim,Type
Timestamp,UTC,Time of observation.,1,CDF_EPOCH
Latitude,degrees,Geocentric latitude.,1,CDF_REAL4
Longitude,degrees,Geocentric longitude.,1,CDF_REAL4
Radius,m,Geocentric radius.,1,CDF_REAL4
QDLatitude,degrees,Quasi-dipole magnetic latitude.,1,CDF_REAL4
MLT,hour,Magnetic local time.,1,CDF_REAL4
Vixh,m/s,Along-track ion drift from horizontal TII sensor in satellite-track coordinates.,1,CDF_REAL4
Vixh_error,m/s,Random error estimate for along-track ion drift from horizontal TII sensor in satellite-track coordinates. Negative value indicates no estimate available.,1,CDF_REAL4
Vixv,m/s,Along-track ion drift from vertical TII sensor in satellite-track coordinates.,1,CDF_REAL4
Vixv_error,m/s,Random error estimate for along-track ion drift from vertical TII sensor in satellite-track coordinates. Negative value indicates no estimate available.,1,CDF_REAL4
Viy,m/s,Cross-track horizontal ion drift from horizontal TII sensor in satellite-track coordinates.,1,CDF_REAL4
Viy_error,m/s,Random error estimate for cross-track horizontal ion drift from horizontal TII sensor in satellite-track coordinates. Negative value indicates no estimate available.,1,CDF_REAL4
Viz,m/s,Cross-track vertical ion drift from vertical TII sensor in satellite-track coordinates.,1,CDF_REAL4
Viz_error,m/s,Random error estimate for cross-track vertical ion drift from vertical TII sensor in satellite-track coordinates. Negative value indicates no estimate available.,1,CDF_REAL4
VsatN,m/s,Satellite velocity N component in north-east-centre coordinates.,1,CDF_REAL4
VsatE,m/s,Satellite velocity E component in north-east-centre coordinates.,1,CDF_REAL4
VsatC,m/s,Satellite velocity C component in north-east-centre coordinates.,1,CDF_REAL4
Ehx,mV/m,"Electric field x component in satellite-track coordinates, derived from -VxB with along-track ion drift from horizontal sensor.",1,CDF_REAL4
Ehy,mV/m,"Electric field y component in satellite-track coordinates, derived from -VxB with along-track ion drift from horizontal sensor.",1,CDF_REAL4
Ehz,mV/m,"Electric field z component in satellite-track coordinates, derived from -VxB with along-track ion drift from horizontal sensor.",1,CDF_REAL4
Evx,mV/m,"Electric field x component in satellite-track coordinates, derived from -VxB with along-track ion drift from vertical sensor.",1,CDF_REAL4
Evy,mV/m,"Electric field y component in satellite-track coordinates, derived from -VxB with along-track ion drift from vertical sensor.",1,CDF_REAL4
Evz,mV/m,"Electric field z component in satellite-track coordinates, derived from -VxB with along-track ion drift from vertical sensor.",1,CDF_REAL4
Bx,nT,"Geomagnetic field x component in satellite-track coordinates, derived from the 1 Hz product.",1,CDF_REAL4
By,nT,"Geomagnetic field y component in satellite-track coordinates, derived from the 1 Hz product.",1,CDF_REAL4
Bz,nT,"Geomagnetic field z component in satellite-track coordinates, derived from the 1 Hz product.",1,CDF_REAL4
Vicrx,m/s,Ion drift corotation signal x component in satellite-track coorinates. This has been removed from ion drift and electric field.,1,CDF_REAL4
Vicry,m/s,Ion drift corotation signal y component in satellite-track coorinates. This has been removed from ion drift and electric field.,1,CDF_REAL4
Vicrz,m/s,Ion drift corotation signal z component in satellite-track coorinates. This has been removed from ion drift and electric field.,1,CDF_REAL4
Quality_flags,-,"Bitwise flag for each velocity component, where a value of 1 for a particular component signifies that calibration was successful, and that the baseline 1-sigma noise level is less than or equal to 100 m/s at 2 Hz. Electric field quality can be assessed from these flags according to -vxB. Bit0 (least significant) = Vixh, bit1 = Vixv, bit2 = Viy, bit3 = Viz. Refer to the release notes for details.",1,CDF_UINT2
Calibration_flags,-,Information about the calibration process. Refer to the release notes for details.,1,CDF_UINT4
